name: CISA Cybersecurity Advisories
notes: Structured, consistent format. Excellent for ground truth. Co-authored with FBI, NSA, etc.

name: Mandiant / Google Threat Intelligence Blog
notes: Detailed APT reports with IOCs and TTPs. Often includes MITRE ATT&CK mapping.

name: CrowdStrike Blog - Threat Intelligence
notes: Named threat actor reports (FANCY BEAR, COZY BEAR, etc.). Good ATT&CK coverage.

name: Unit 42 / Palo Alto Networks Research
notes: Technical deep-dives on campaigns and malware. Usually includes IOCs.

name: Microsoft Threat Intelligence Blog
notes: Uses Blizzard/Tempest naming. Rich MITRE ATT&CK mapping.

name: The DFIR Report
notes: Extremely detailed intrusion writeups with timelines, IOCs, TTPs, and command lines. Best for ground truth.

name: Elastic Security Labs
notes: Malware analysis and detection rule content. Often includes Elastic detection rules.

name: SentinelOne Labs
notes: Deep technical analysis of malware and threat actors.

name: Sophos News - Security Research
notes: Ransomware and malware analysis. Good IOC coverage.

name: Trend Micro Research
notes: APT campaign tracking (Earth * naming). Good for Asian threat groups.

name: Volexity Blog
notes: Excellent zero-day exploitation writeups. Detailed IOCs and forensic artifacts.

name: Recorded Future - Insikt Group
notes: Nation-state tracking and infrastructure analysis.

name: Proofpoint Threat Research
notes: Email-based threat campaigns (TA### naming). Good for phishing IOCs.

name: Cisco Talos Intelligence
notes: Vulnerability research and malware analysis. Good network-level IOCs.

name: Secureworks Counter Threat Unit
notes: Detailed threat group profiles (IRON/GOLD/BRONZE naming).

name: Check Point Research
notes: Malware analysis and campaign tracking.

name: NSA Cybersecurity Advisories
notes: Joint advisories with CISA. Excellent IOC lists and detection guidance.

name: Malware Traffic Analysis
notes: PCAP files with malicious traffic. Essential for Suricata rule testing.

name: ANY.RUN Malware Trends
notes: Current malware sample analysis with behavioral indicators.

name: Malpedia - Fraunhofer FKIE
notes: Curated malware family database with YARA rules. Reference for malware naming.
